revised_title: An Experimental Research on Cerebro-Cortical Afferent and Efferent Tracts
tldr: This study investigates the afferent and efferent tracts in the cerebral cortex by examining the effects of lesions on the visual and auditory systems in monkeys. The researchers used the Marchi method to analyze the degeneration induced by these lesions and compared their findings with previous studies. The results provide insights into the organization and function of sensory tracts and centers in the brain.
